Parameters: MediaPlayer: the player that reports the new subtitle data This value must never be null.
SubtitleData: the subtitle data This value must never be null.
onSubtitleData(android.media.MediaPlayer.Description: Method called when new subtitle data is available
onSubtitleData(android.media.MediaPlayer.FullName: public abstract void onSubtitleData (MediaPlayer mp, SubtitleData data)

ClassDesc: Interface definition of a callback to be invoked when a player subtitle track has new subtitle data available. See the @B_android#media#MediaPlayer#setOnSubtitleDataListener_E@ method for the description of which track will report data through this listener.
